website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight cooking torch with easy flame adjustment to give you just as much heat as you need.
pros: High quality at a price that will fit into any budget
cons: Some of these torches have had issues with the butane leaking out

customer_reviews.title: Great torch for multiple different projects and tasks.
customer_reviews.text: Has been A1 since day 1 it was cheaper than all the rest pretty sweet colors easy to refill and has a gauge to tell how much butane u got left it got here super fast the safety lock is smooth adjust the flame size.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell vuolo

customer_reviews.title: Spicy Dew Cares About Its Customers!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this torch six months before the throttle gave out on me. I reached out to Spicy Dew on Facebook and they were VERY friendly and offered to replace the item for me at no cost. They didn't have to do that, but they made it right, which speaks volumes. You will be hard-pressed to find a better product, but I guarantee you won't find a better company. Thanks, Spicy Dew!
customer_reviews.author: David B Rozanski

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my Craft Room
customer_reviews.text: My blow torch arrived quickly. The instructions for filling the tank were quick and easy. Instructions for using the torch were clear and concise. Using the item is so easy and I like not having to hold a button down the entire time I’m using it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry M. Foley

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail of Torches!
customer_reviews.text: As a Jewelery crafter i rely on stable temps of heat to make precise shapes and solders- all seriousness a side- this torch had the feel like someone who knows what a torch should feel and perform like thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This honestly was the first torch I’ve bought since I’ve just taken up cooking. For no experience I assumed it would be difficult to manage or use correctly because I’ve read that others have issues in it squirting the butane all over the place. It was pretty simple and easy to follow the instructions. Great for a beginner for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Safety system implemented very safely.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality, feel like a seriously made device. So far it works very well. And I like the it has a relatively high power range from very short to the long flame length. I’ve found this device should fit all your home cooking and other needs. Filled the butane from the first time, easily, It was my the main concern, but did it smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Great Torch with no leaks
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this torch several times and it is still going strong. I have not had the leaks that others have mentioned but I also twist the valve to close when I am not using it. I filled up the torch on the first day and it's been at least three weeks since I have used it and there is still fuel in it.
customer_reviews.author: Popo

customer_reviews.title: HQ, well built, fuel gage. Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is the one! Feels well-built, high quality. Strong flame, easy to use, intuitive. Made Crème Brûlé same day it came in. Fantastic. Really like the fuel gage. (bought a different model, from another company, cheaper, before this one, and threw it away today. Don't make the same mistake.) Get this one. For me, great value!
customer_reviews.author: RayFromMA

customer_reviews.title: Updated: After only two months of use the igniter no longer works
customer_reviews.text: When I received this unit, I was impressed with the apparent quality, design and safety features. What I didn't expect is that less than 2 months later, the spark igniter, activated by some internal combination of safety button and trigger, no longer sparks requiring a separate source of flame to ignite the torch to be able to use it. Update: seller replaced the defective torch no questions asked. Upgrading to 5
customer_reviews.author: OBX Windsurfer

customer_reviews.title: Toasted the topping perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Hot Gun ! Worked well to finish a Holiday Desert topping was browned easily in no time. Looking forward to trying other recipes! Great product easy to use but obviously take your time very hot flame 🔥
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Very comfortable to hold, and the adjustable flame setting is extremely helpful for acquiring different levels of control to prevent over burning or under burning. Sturdy construction and easy to use, and has a fool proof safety system that does not interfere with usability. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lenett

customer_reviews.title: Great tourch for use with oil dab rig
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I did a lot of research and reading reviews before choosing this tourch. What makes this paticular model stand out is the feature of the saftey button, the flame adjuster and the butane level window. This tourch is easy to use right out of the box. I use this product to heat up wax concentrate nails, both quartz crystal and titanium and it works great for that. It heats evenly, quickley and quietly.
customer_reviews.author: theunderdawg

customer_reviews.title: Best little torch around!
customer_reviews.text: LUV this little torch! Powerful, easy to hold, easy to fill, and it gets HOTTT! I've tried others but this one is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great for creme brûlée
customer_reviews.text: Totally a need if you make creme brûlée! This took my dish up to the level of people thinking I had purchased it. Yes it is a blow torch so make sure to store this safely away from kids, but I do think it is safer than sitting in front of the oven with the broiler on to make sure you get an even crust. Great gift and pretty easy to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best torch for the money I have ever found!! Holds butane very well and being able to actually see how full it is was a great and useful touch to the design of this torch. Shipped and arrived SUPER fast. I would recommend this torch to anyone! Will work great for whatever you are using it for :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting the Most Smoked Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of the product. The upside; it does what it was designed to do. The downside, two small (very small) containers of chips. I do like a smokier tasting dish and it all depends on how much smoke you use and how long you let the smoke linger. Light smoke: let smoke linger for about five minutes. For a heavier smoke, let the smoke linger until smoke finally begins to clear. An even heavier smoke flavor, repeat the process. It depends largely on your likes. Have fun and don't be afraid to try different smoking techniques. "Bon Appetit."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT! WE USE THIS AFTER SOUS VIDE TO GIVE ...
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT! WE USE THIS AFTER SOUS VIDE TO GIVE A BIT OF A GRILL EFFECT TO OUR MEATS.
customer_reviews.author: R Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. Very dangerous. Randomly explodes flames out of entire mechanism. Shoots long flames not torch flame.
customer_reviews.author: Ruger

customer_reviews.title: I looked at many and was not sure which one to choose.
customer_reviews.text: I choose this one because it had a gauge to measure how much fluid / gas was left in it. Not so sure the gauge works. It may very well be me. Its sturdy and a good quality. I made creme brulee , and also took chicken off the grill and crisped up the BBQ sauce. (instead of burning it on the grill like I sometimes do). I will find other uses for it, but I like it alot and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this torch because of all the positive ratings by others and they were right! It's lightweight, fits in my hand nicely, and works just great. I especially like the easy to see fuel gauge and the safety lock.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. Every foodie should have one!
customer_reviews.text: It sometimes doesn’t ignite when u press the trigger. Im pretty sure that’s typical for most blow torches? After 3 to 4 triggers it turns on. And boy does it get hot. Refilling it was a little tricky and some of the butane came out. Maybe it’s me whose refilling it wrong. The product feels sturdy and it’s easy to use. I would recommend and feel like it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works So Great, My Husband Stole It From Me!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill, use, and has great safety features. My creme brûlée likes it, as does my husband for lighting our fireplace...
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Tough for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a kitchen torch before and wanted an even coating of sugar on creme brulee. I got that, finally, so the product did what it was supposed to do, but the process was not easy. Instructions are almost nonexistent and not particularly helpful for someone who was using butane for the first time. It took many attempts to prime the torch. I felt more confident by the time I got to the sixth bowl, but the torch continued to need several attempts each time I tried to light it. For occasional use like mine, it's okay. If I had to use it every day, I would pull my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sharpless

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! You need this people!
customer_reviews.text: Can use it with one hand. It’s a quality product made with durable materials. They even have your safety in mind... which is great because I’m clumsy. Used this for epoxy resin art!! Works like a dream!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crafty mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love that you can control the flame and see the butane level!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Perfect size for the job. Was just what my creme brûlée’s needed!
customer_reviews.author: Ami D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen torch!
customer_reviews.text: Have had several torch's and this is the best by far. Great control with adjustable flame !
customer_reviews.author: A6 Intruder

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising, no fuel gauge.
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertised to have a fuel gauge, which it does not have. One star for false advertising, and returning the product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased two and they don't last
customer_reviews.text: The good... you can see the butane levels and that helps when filling. When it works, it strikes up quickly. The bad... I dropped the first one, and of course, the cheap base cracked. Setting a hot piece down, sans bottom, is an awkward feat. But, I used the torch until it wouldn't light anymore... about a year. The second one only lasted for seven months. The flint stopped striking and that jams the safety button. Really, not usable from that point. The ugly... They keep getting more expensive for the same so-so product.
customer_reviews.author: music gal

customer_reviews.title: (WARNING) Not a Terrific Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have had the first one I returned because of a very slow leak. Only to discover that the replacement also has the same problem where if I didn't turn the adjustment valve all the way down to the OFF position the next day the fuel tank would be empty. It is costly because fuel was wasted, butane is not cheap. So if you remember to turn the valve DOWN to being OFF it will not leak. I would suggest that you choose a different torch.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Fuel does not last 60 min as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use but fuel did not last 60 minutes as advertised. Lasted about 10 minutes. I paid more for this model because it advertised a longer torch time than competitors. I needed to torch marshmallows on cookies and it used the entire can of fuel
customer_reviews.author: J. Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fill with butane gas
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about using this torch for a brûléed pumpkin pie over Thanksgiving. I followed all of the (fairly minimal) instructions on the box carefully, but none of the fuel ever got into the torch. I contacted the seller a week ago with this issue, but they have not replied to my message at all. I'm disappointed and I'm returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wouter Kool

customer_reviews.title: Not quite 6 weeks before it broke!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item during the second week of November. It is now Dec 27th, and the product no longer works. I would have gotten more for my money if I’d thrown it out the window. Don’t waste your time OR your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Christy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very precise and easy to use! It works perfect for creme brûlée and even melting cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Well built, easy to hold, window to fuel tank
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well made. Really like the window on the side so you can see the butane level, very nice feature. Adjustable flame is easy to use, big flame when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Monsipapa

customer_reviews.title: Brulee torch leaks gas.
customer_reviews.text: After one month the gas leaks out. Refill it and the gas leaks out again. Now it is past the return date. It goes in the trash....
customer_reviews.author: larrybsarver

customer_reviews.title: Will not fill plus is not user friendly to left handed users
customer_reviews.text: Bought the green model and found I could only use it in my right hand due to the action of the child safety switch. Being left handed it was cumbersome to use and required switching hands. I returned the torch and ordered the black. It has a different safety system and is friendly to both the left and right hand. ADDED NOTE since I returned two more of these torches (black model) which like the original green would not fill with gas. I used two different brand butane fuel with the long neck and universal as per the instructions provided. However, could not fill the torch.
customer_reviews.author: JTK

customer_reviews.title: Disapointing, stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Let me say this thing started out great. After a month or so the button is getting stuck on and/or off and doesn't function appropriately. Very disappointing and I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It's great, but can be better.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Easy to refill -Collar keeps torch from sliding down my hand (even if I'm barely holding it) -Locking feature allows me to turn on the torch and lock the flame in one smooth motion -Butane level visible on the side Cons: -It does not always light up for me on the first try -It does not stay in the highest output on its own even after I turn the dial all the way -Once the flame is on I have to turn the dial to the left a bit to get max output and hold to maintain it I'm not sure if these cons are due to a defective unit, but that's how mine behaves.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great torch!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this torch! I made s’mores tarts the other day and used it to toast the marshmallows. It was really easy to fill with the butane, and really easy to use. I like being able to adjust the flame. My only complaint (and I use that word very lightly) is that I couldn’t quite figure out a kids safety lock? Maybe I wasn’t using it right- but when I slid it either direction I was still able to light it. Though it worked perfectly for locking the flame on while I was using it so I didn’t have to keep holding the button.
customer_reviews.author: JLK1020

customer_reviews.title: Beware of eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. I played with it a bit before I gave it to her and I thought it worked great. Could make a lot of things in the kitchen. Even burn wood if that was your thing. Works fantastic with drink smokers. They only problem was when she burnt her eyebrows off. Never mistake a burning torch for a phone folks. Not only do you miss your call but. Well. I think you get the idea. Great torch anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: This torch is "hot"!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I was a little intimidated about using a blow torch. I bought it to bring out cells in my acrylic flow paintings. This gadget is great! The filling process was quite easy (Be sure to buy the butane cans with the long nozzles). The fill gauge comes in handy especially for a first time user. The child safety features are a smart addition making it safe to have. This little torch has some power and the flame is fully adjustable making it awesome to use for cooking, paintings etc. I'd definitely purchase this torch again.
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to fill and it leaks - DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this three years ago and didn't have much use of it at the time. Today I just attempted to fill it and the fuel leaked out of the top of the unit as I was filling it. When I stopped and turned it right side up, I heard a continual hissing sounds because the fuel continued to leak out. I'm afraid to use it now because of the leak. Too bad I didn't test it more when it was still in warranty. It's going in the trash as soon as it stops hissing.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE reservoir!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this torch at the recommendation of a friend. I have used hers before. I love the reservoir. No other torch I know of has this deep of a reservoir. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to fill mine entirely. I'm out of butane. I love the ability to click this torch on and off. It's quite handy. Keeping the prolonged flame certainly allows for a longer opportunity to heat whatever you use this torch for. I was disappointed with the price increase, but oh well. Overall, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Torch I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: This thing is better than my large commercial one, and better than other small torches I've bought. The only down side is that it really eats fuel. The seller also pointed out that you must buy fuel that has a long delivery tube on the can.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Best brûlée torch
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few brûlée torches but they always required me to hold down a button to keep it lit or to pull some safety thing that kept resetting when it wouldn't light. I understand that there may be some people who cannot keep this type of equipment out of the hands of children however I appreciate a company who makes a product for people who can accept responsibility
customer_reviews.author: MAV

customer_reviews.title: So satisfying to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this thing quite a bit-- charred broccolini, finishing off ribs, pork for ramen, etc. Very happy with the results. My only issue is that there's a lot of leakage when refilling the butane, though I should probably try different nozzles. Alternatively, it might make more sense to simply use a product that fits on top of a butane canister, rather than filling up a separate unit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good 'forever'
customer_reviews.text: Good 'forever' What's better than a tool that you keep on filling and using? This torch has a standard gas nipple that I fill from a can that I buy at a local smoke shop. The gas fuel is inexpensive, I don't need to buy special canisters and the filling is simple. The flame adjustment and lock mechanisms make sense and are easy to use. I bought this one for myself and will buy for fiends and family who cook.
customer_reviews.author: Ori Artman

customer_reviews.title: Learn from my mistake!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this torch! It worked great at first, but now it won't light I have to constantly press the trigger to get it to light... sometimes. And, yes... It's full of fuel. I used it to release bubbles from epoxy when doing tumblers, and of course, right after the return window closes it fails. Learn from my mistake, go with another brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE, GREAT TO HAVE A FUEL GAUGE
customer_reviews.text: This torch has a few features that make it stand out in its price range. The presence of a fuel gauge is a real plus and it's easy to view. The adjustable flame is terrific, and it's easy to turn on and off. That last feature may sound too simple but I always had trouble turning my old torch on, and then had no idea if it was out of fuel. All in all, this is a good buy for the money I spent and will consider giving these as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Aftewicz

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 months. When I pull the trigger I can hear the gas coming oug, but there is no fire. I know it is not an expensive equipment, but I don't think it is acceptable to last only 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: alex kwitko

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Kitchen Torch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this torch after having Creme Brule at a local restaurant. So far, I haven't been able to use it, however, my husband has taken it to use when bar-b-queuing chicken and steak. It is a really fantastic kitchen torch. So glad I finally got one.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Pokoj

customer_reviews.title: Not continuous burn.
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep reigniting it. Sometimes I need to keep a lit flame in front to keep torch on
customer_reviews.author: James Lahage

customer_reviews.title: Small hands alert
customer_reviews.text: The torch was okay and what I sort of expected for the price. I had another one and it had problems because it was cheaply made. However, if your hands are small (like mine), it is very difficult to depress the safety lock and the trigger at the same time, especially for a sustained period -- I made 12 creme brulees and torching the tops was real work for me. Overall, an okay product, but manufacturer could definitely benefit from some R&D.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great- Easy to Use- Quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received reassuring customer service email from the company PRIOR to the product arriving- so I expected the product to be good quality. Product arrived as expected. Note you do need to get butane fuel. We got it at a tobacco shop (same fuel used in lighters). Quick and easy auto lighting and the safety feature (red sliding lock tab) is easy to operate and has a “click” sound so you know it locked in place. Highly recommend product!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Olson

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: Yall r gonna laugh. I bought this to brown my food. I am a truck driver and ended up using this for the 1st time to thaw my air brakes. Beyond my expectations. If it can do that its gonna brown ur darn marshmallows.
customer_reviews.author: Do it yourselfer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home torch for Crème Brûlée
customer_reviews.text: Finally a great torch. Bought 2 others before this one, finally found one I love. Great for Crème Brûlée. Refillable in seconds. I suggest using a food grade fuel. Simple and comfortable. You open the gas valve, then spark it into life. Simply hold the base while flaming. Turn off the valve to stop, the safety clicks into place for protection. Simple and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim.Moor

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the Butane that shows up as a suggestion.
customer_reviews.text: I actually haven't had a chance to use this yet. But when i got it, it said "people who bought this also bought - " And paired container of Butane with it. You want to get a long nozzle option. More of it leaked out and was wasted Than i actually got inside the blow torch. I will come back later and review when i get a different can of butane to fill it up with .
customer_reviews.author: Hannah C

customer_reviews.title: Needed adapter
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my partner and he loves it. He had to get some sort of adapter for filling it but I think that was related to the butane bottle. He said it wasn't expensive but needed it or else he couldn't fill the torch. Other than that it's worked perfectly and he just loves the thing.
customer_reviews.author: MoonPye

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old torch that would no longer give me a pin point flame and would not shut off until it ran out of fuel. The safety lock and flame control are much easier to use than my old one. My daughter likes the green and we look forward to our first use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Works good, needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: I like that this has a connected base so I can use it without worry the base will fall off. It also has a fuel window which is helpful. The child lock feature works but I don't like it - just because it's annoying on any product. The reason I don't give it a 5 is the flame is inconsistent. It will start strong and then weaken while I'm working. Mine is covered in paint as I use it to torch acrylic and resin pours.
customer_reviews.author: Wire Inspirations

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not good.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this two times. It leaks the butane out between uses and I have already gone through a whole thing of butane? It doesn’t want to light as its leaking!! I would not buy this again or recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It was only a week before the trigger failed to work most of the time. And with in almost a month it wont light at all anymore. The trigger is super loud so there is also no being discrete. It also just eats through butane faster than any torch ive had.
customer_reviews.author: Aletriss

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome it's built very sturdy and seems like it's made from pretty good materials. It holds a lot of butane and seems like it will last for a good while. The locking mechanism is great and works as intended. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: The torch works well enough, heats things up quickly and lasts quite a bit after each butane fill. Some of the components do feel cheap (specifically the locking mechanism which has a bit of give/wiggle) but I haven't had an issue with it so far after about 6 weeks of daily use. The starting button does need to be pressed in quite firmly to start the torch, pressing it lightly starts the gas stream but doesn't ignite it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Effective torch but delicate flame adjuster
customer_reviews.text: The torch started off great but within weeks it was knocked over when not in use. The flame adjuster on the top of the torch broke apart after falling around 6 inches. Luckily we are satisfied with the setting it was on and still use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Well designed torch at a good cost
customer_reviews.text: Nice torch. Easy to use and easy cleanup. (Be sure to let the unit cool before cleaning.) fill nozzle (at base bottom) should have a cover and doesn’t but other than that, this is a well designed unit at a good cost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: impossible to fuel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this plus the coupled zippo butane. I fueled my lighter immediately, no problem. This torch piece of junk was impossible to fuel. Ridiculous product. Maybe mine is defective, but whether it's just mine or the entire product, it's garbage and impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great features, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a blow torch, this was my first. I like the safety features, it's my main reason for choosing this one. I am using this for art and not food. It's easy to use and fill. I have smaller hands and I don't have any problems using it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Paccione

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using a torch with cooking. Having seen them used on various cooking shows, I wanted to try using a torch with a meringue topping. The torch was very easy to operate! My family raved over how well the meringue was browned. The torch will get a lot of use during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 2nd tries a CHARM
customer_reviews.text: Ok i just recieved my replacement in literally like 2 to 3days even during this PANDEMIC.I recieved a defective TORCH first and this company was quick with the replacement great customer service.My first torch had a few problems but besides those I was loving this TORCH. You can't go wrong here even though my first one was defective these guys came through with a replacement and I didn't have to send mine back either (I literally have no use for the defective one but it saved me time.Oh and this flame gets hot
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Tokunaga

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a torch that will last and is decently priced, this is probably it. It's easy to fill, has a clear measuring chamber to allow you to see how much butane is inside and can lock the trigger so you don't have to hold your finger on it the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for creme brûlée
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for creme brûlée, it turned out amazing ! Easy to use, doesn’t use a ton of butane so it lasts quite a bit. Also, but the butane with the long neck! Otherwise it won’t fit :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: It lasted me only a month before you could hear the butane coming out the torch at almost full blast and when I tried to mess with it, because the smell of butane was getting too much, the adjuster knob popped off. Other than that problem the torch worked great before hand definitely one of the best torches out there.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 3 months
